Getting Started With Specify

Specify ensures you retain complete control over your data by utilizing Inrupt's SOLID DataPOD platform. Visit Inrupt.com to learn more about this awesome technology andcreate your DataPOD for free!

If you want to discover how your data is being used to protect your local environment, and how you can get paid for your contributions to the Specify ecosystem, read aboutthe objectives of the Specify community!

Getting Specific

You may input your postal zip code to discover what items are recyclable in your area, based upon what other users in your area have specified.

You may also input materially types manually, separated by commas or new lines. The type of recyclable is being validated against a lexicon of material names. If you receive an error message, please check the spelling and refer to the lexicon of material class types. If you want to learn more about why we enforce type checking, check out our blog post on schemas.
